info.narration: #0 is going into $0's containment unit to begin the task.

collection.name: La Luna
collection.openText: “Tales say the moon bewitch man. But, in reality, man despairs at the moon.”

observe.desc:
[ {<Counseling audio record of employee (Redacted)>
“We didn’t see anything peculiar when we went to secure it. There was just some lady sitting there. It was like she was waiting for us to come. What happened when one of us approached her? He didn’t know a thing about art or music. But before we knew it, he was playing the first movement of Sonata. And the lady smiled. ….To be honest, I don’t think I will ever listen to a piano performance that beautiful again. We couldn’t see him again. That’s why you need my testimony, right? Because I played the third movement." (Omitted)} ]

[ {“…The moon represents the human psyche. People often say that the moon is beautiful. But when enough time passed, when you look at it and see what kind of face it truly has, you will realize you were madly in love with something so broken and shattered. In the end, we all become moon. Because we can’t bear ourselves."} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: The piano can be played with perform order. However, be noted that Qliphoth Counter decreases when the work is finished.
The music temporarily increased Temperance and Justice of the employees by a small degree. However, the employee who performed spent 50% of their HP.
Qliphoth Counter decreased by medium chance when the work result was normal.
Qliphoth Counter decreased when the work result was bad.
Qliphoth Counter reached 0 when an employee entered the containment unit to play for the third time.
When escaped, $0 returned to its containment chamber voluntarily when the third movement ended. Also, the third movement ended when $0 was suppressed.
